Name: Carbon Black
Author: Microsoft Corporation
Description: [VMWare Carbon Black]('https://www.vmware.com/products/carbon-black-cloud-endpoint.html') transforms your security with cloud native endpoint protection that adapts to your needs. VMWare Carbon Black provides an endpoint platform that helps you spot the minor fluctuations that hide malicious attacks and adapt prevention in response. Microsoft Sentinel Solutions provide a consolidated way to acquire Microsoft Sentinel content like data connectors, workbooks, analytics, and automations in your workspace with a single deployment step.
